Package uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon.store.disk

Provides the classes and interfaces of the MEKON Disk-Based Instance-Store Mechanism API (see uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon for general description).

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ICustomFrameMatcher
    Interface whose implementations will provide customised query matching for specified frame-valued slot-types, to override the basic subsumption-based matching provided by the IMatcher implementations.
    ICustomNumberMatcher
    Interface whose implementations will provide customised query matching for specified number-valued slot-types, to override the default subsumption-based matching provided by the IMatcher implementations.
    ICustomStringMatcher
    Interface whose implementations will provide customised query matching for specific string-valued slot-types, to override the default subsumption-based matching provided by the IMatcher implementations (which for string-valued slot-types means simple equality checking).
    ICustomValueMatcher
    Base-interface for value-type specific interfaces whose implementations will provide customised query matching for the relevant value-types for specified slot-types, to override the default subsumption-based matching provided by the IMatcher implementations.
    IDiskStoreNames
    Defines file and directory names used by the disk-based instance-store implementation.
    IMatcher
    Provides mechanisms for storing and executing queries over representations of sets of instantiations of a MEKON Frames Model (FM).
    IMatcherIndexes
    Provides mapping for each unique instance identity to a corresponding unique index value.
    IProfileSerialiserVocab
    Vocabulary for the XML serialisation of instance profile information as represented by the disk-based instance-store within instance-profile files.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    IDiskStoreBuilder
    Provides mechanisms for building a disk-based instance-store, as represented by an IStore object.
    IInstanceProfile
    Represents profile information about an instance stored in the disk-based instance-store.
    IMatcherConfig
    Provides configuation information that may be required by implementations of IMatcher
    IMatchInstanceRefExpander
    Responsible for editing IFrame/ISlot networks representing specific stored instances, by adding expansions of any external instances referenced from within the networks.
    IProfileSerialiser
    Provides XML serialisation of instance profile information for the disk-based instance-store.
    IValueMatchCustomiser
    Provides customised query matching for a particular value-type, via a specific ICustomValueMatcher, together with a particular set of applicable slot-types.

Package uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon.store.disk Description

Provides the classes and interfaces of the MEKON Disk-Based Instance-Store Mechanism API (see uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon for general description).
